Articles.Content:
We NEED a new wormhole mod. Probably something like the one in interstellar.

![post-1-0-97811600-1415387883.jpg](http://odin.az/uploads/monthly_11_2014/post-1-0-97811600-1415387883.jpg)

Imagine how awesome it would be if it was paired up with a mod like Multiple star systems. You can have a massive wormhole orbiting Jool that leads to the other star systems, and the blackhole in the center can be retextured to look like gargantua.

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/103298-0-90-Working-Multiple-Star-Systems%28WITH-PLANETS%21%29?p=1604011#post1604011](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/103298-0-90-Working-Multiple-Star-Systems%28WITH-PLANETS%21%29?p=1604011#post1604011)

![ut_interstellarOpener_f.png](http://www.wired.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/10/ut_interstellarOpener_f.png)

The best part is that there already is a mod that adds in the gravitational lensing effects, so all we need now is someone willing to make the mod.

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/109269-Custom-Shader-Loader-2-0-release](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/109269-Custom-Shader-Loader-2-0-release)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-16T23:20:01Z" title="04/16/2015 11:20  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 16, 2015</time> by DuoDex**

Here's a list of all the [current faster-than-light mods](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/113665)

In particular the [ESLD Jump Beacons](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/91582) ([0.90 fix](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/91582-24-2-ESLD-Jump-Beacons-Dev-0-3b-2014-09-21?p=1688535&viewfull=1#post1688535)) have the same mechanic as wormholes. If you swapped out the graphics and removed the fuel requirement, you're basically done.
